content: this pattern is an adaptation of the 6-day supertar blanket and 6-day superstar shawl by betty mcknit adapted especially for noro yarn it creates a stunning slightly more than half-circular star-shaped shawl with nine points and a unique border there is also a shawl adaptation of the 6-day star blanket and shawl for noro yarns called the 6-day staro shawl details us terminology skill level easy finished size 60 wide x 30 long materials yarn two balls of noro yukata shown in #6 kawasaki or 1500 yards of #2 weight yarn hook furls odyssey size h 5 mm stitch markers yarn needle for weaving in ends optional shawl clip pin button or other closure what s the difference between the 6-day superstaro shawl and the original 6-day supertar shawl the 6-day superstar shawl is adaptable to any yarn hook and you can make continue it to any size you like the 6-day superstaro shawl is designed specifically to use two balls of noro yukata and gives helpful hints to avoid color pooling the superstaro includes an optional buttonhole for you to add a closure if you want one the superstaro shawl has a back post edge to show off noro s amazing colors
